files..github/workflows/{{workflowFile}}.yaml:
name: {{workflowName}}

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        node-version: [18.x, 20.x]
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{matrix.node-version}}
          cache: 'npm'
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run lint
      - run: npm test
